item.title: 美联储和债券守夜人在特朗普新时代占据中心位置
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得大选的一个直接影响是：华尔街的经济学家们现在认为，考虑到特朗普政策可能带来的通胀效应，美联储决策者会将利率维持在较高水平。【原文：One immediate effect from Donald Trump’s election victory: Wall Street economists now see Fed policymakers keeping interest rates higher than they otherwise would have, given the likely inflationary effect of his policies.】

item.title: 在加密货币押注特朗普之后，法国监管机构对 Polymarket 进行了审查
item.description: 在美国总统大选前后用户需求激增之后，法国博彩监管机构正在检查基于加密货币的预测市场平台 Polymarket 的运营情况，以确定其是否符合当地规则。【原文：France’s gambling regulator is examining the operations of cryptocurrency-based prediction markets platform Polymarket to see if it complies with local rules following a surge in user demand around the US presidential election.】

item.title: 即使股东退出收购的收益放缓，凯雷仍提高了利润率
item.description: 凯雷投资集团（Carlyle Group Inc.首席执行官哈维-施瓦茨（Harvey Schwartz）在第三季度提高了利润率和收费收益，但该公司股东从交易退出中获得的利润仍然微薄。【原文：Carlyle Group Inc. Chief Executive Harvey Schwartz made progress lifting margins and earnings on fees in the third quarter, a period when shareholder profits from deal exits remained muted for the firm.】

item.title: 权衡价格压力，塞尔维亚维持利率不变
item.description: 塞尔维亚中央银行维持借贷成本不变，这一出人意料的举动表明决策者在权衡挥之不去的价格压力时持谨慎态度。【原文：Serbia’s central bank kept borrowing costs on hold, an unexpected move that signaled caution as policymakers weigh lingering price pressures.】

item.title: 瑞典将为电池研究和被解雇工人提供新支持
item.description: 瑞典政府承诺为研究提供新资金，并推动保留被 Northvolt AB 裁减的工人的技能，以此支持该国新兴的电池行业。【原文：The government of Sweden has promised to support the country’s fledgling battery industry with new funds for research and a push to retain the skills of workers made redundant by Northvolt AB.】

item.title: 印度最高法院下令对破产的捷特航空公司进行清算
item.description: 印度最高法院周四裁定，曾经是印度第二大航空公司的捷特航空公司（Jet Airways）将被清算，从而结束了这家破产航空公司长达五年的破产清算传奇。【原文：Jet Airways, once India‘s second-biggest carrier, is to be liquidated, the country’s Supreme Court ruled Thursday, ending a tumultuous five-year insolvency resolution saga for the bankrupt airline.】

item.title: 津巴布韦中央银行将放松货币管制并允许 ZiG 自由流通
item.description: 津巴布韦央行副行长表示，津巴布韦希望其黄金支持的货币能在外汇市场上自由浮动，但他拒绝透露具体时间。【原文：Zimbabwe wants its gold-backed currency to float freely on the foreign exchange market, the central bank’s deputy governor said, though he declined to spell out when this would happen.】

item.title: 财政部解除制裁，美国特使称赞拉脱维亚银行清理工作
item.description: 美国驻拉脱维亚大使称赞波罗的海国家在银行业垮台后的六年里为整顿金融业所做的努力，称美国今年撤销制裁措施的决定将有助于投资。【原文：The US ambassador to Latvia lauded the Baltic nation’s efforts to clean up its financial sector in the six years since a banking fallout, saying a US decision to withdraw a sanctions measure this year will help investment.】

item.title: 以太阳能电池板为抵押的债券交易即将进入欧洲市场
item.description: 习惯于购买重新打包的抵押贷款和汽车贷款的欧洲投资者正在获得另一种资产支持证券投资：由太阳能电池板贷款支持的债券。【原文：European investors accustomed to buying repackaged mortgages and car loans are getting another type of asset-backed security to invest in: bonds backed by solar panel loans.】

item.title: 通胀率接近目标，秘鲁将下调关键利率
item.description: 在上个月意外按兵不动之后，秘鲁很可能会降低借贷成本，因为通胀率仍在央行目标区间的中心附近徘徊。【原文：Peru will likely lower borrowing costs after a surprise hold last month and as inflation continues to hover around the center of the central bank’s target range.】

item.title: 特朗普推动的美元反弹为欧洲出口商带来一线希望
item.description: 对于欧洲一些最大的出口商来说，美元走强的前景为唐纳德-特朗普赢得大选带来的不确定前景提供了一线希望。【原文：For some of Europe’s biggest exporters, the prospect of a stronger dollar offers a silver lining in the uncertain outlook arising from Donald Trump’s election victory.】

item.title: 加纳总统热门人选希望重修 30 亿美元的国际货币基金组织协议
item.description: 加纳主要反对党领导人表示，如果他在下个月的选举中获胜，将重新谈判国际货币基金组织的一项减税和顺利偿还贷款计划。【原文：Ghana’s main opposition leader said he would renegotiate an International Monetary Fund program to reduce taxes and smooth loan repayments if he wins next month’s elections.】

item.title: 分析师称，特朗普关税可能对印尼影响不大
item.description: 据分析师称，与更依赖出口的亚洲邻国相比，美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普提议的关税预计对印尼的影响相对有限。【原文：US President-elect Donald Trump’s proposed tariffs are expected to have a relatively limited impact on Indonesia, compared to its Asian neighbors that are more reliant on exports, according to analysts.】

item.title: 对德国债务狂潮的担忧首次颠覆了关键市场指标
item.description: 德国 10 年期国债收益率有史以来首次升至高于等值掉期利率，因为交易员们担心在德国执政联盟垮台后可能会出售更多债券。【原文：The German 10-year yield rose above the equivalent swap rate for the first time on record as traders braced for the possibility of more bond sales after the nation’s ruling coalition collapsed.】

item.title: 石油钻探商 Perenco 将在非洲投资 20 亿美元的大部分资金
item.description: 亿万富翁佩罗多家族拥有的石油钻探公司佩伦科公司（Perenco SA）明年将把 20 亿美元投资的四分之三集中在少数几个非洲国家，这是包括更多天然气项目在内的战略的一部分。【原文：Oil driller Perenco SA, owned by the billionaire Perrodo family, will concentrate three quarters of its $2 billion investments next year in a handful of African countries as part of a strategy that includes more gas projects.】

item.title: 菲律宾从特朗普推动的美元反弹中获益
item.description: 菲律宾最高经济规划师表示，随着唐纳德-特朗普赢得大选推动美元反弹，菲律宾依赖汇款的经济可能会从比索疲软中受益。【原文：The Philippines’ top economic planner said the nation’s remittance-reliant economy could benefit from the peso’s weakness, as Donald Trump’s election victory fueled a rally in the dollar.】

item.description:

A huge week for news.

item.title: 奇货可居：哈雷-巴斯曼谈特朗普、美联储和债券（播客）
item.description: 美国大选已经结束，唐纳德-特朗普赢得了第二个总统任期。当然，股市因特朗普的获胜而反弹，但债券市场的一些走势更引人关注。不仅美国国债收益率飙升，全球最重要市场的波动预期也在特朗普获胜前走高。尽管人们普遍预计美联储本周将再次下调基准利率，但所有这一切仍在发生。那么，是什么推动了【原文：The US election is over and Donald Trump has won a second term as president. Stocks have rallied on Trump’s win, of course, but some of the more interesting moves have taken place in the bond market. Not only have yields on US Treasuries shot up, but expectations for volatility in the world’s most important market were also shifting higher ahead of Trump’s win. All of this is happening even though the Federal Reserve is widely expected to cut benchmark rates again this week. So what’s driving hi】

item.title: 台积电侯孝贤表示，台湾必须改进芯片技术才能保持领先地位
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）第二次当选美国总统数小时后，台湾最有价值公司的一位高管表示，台湾应投入更多资源推动芯片技术发展，并扩大其供应链专业知识，以保持全球领先地位。【原文：Taiwan should pour more resources into advancing chip technology and expanding its supply chain expertise to maintain global leadership, an executive from its most valuable company said hours after Donald Trump was elected to be US president for the second time.】

item.title: 欧洲央行施纳贝尔认为银行将更多地利用再融资操作
item.description: 欧洲央行执行董事会成员伊莎贝尔-施纳贝尔（Isabel Schnabel）表示，随着政策制定者的债券储量减少，欧元区的贷款人今后可能会更频繁地向欧洲央行寻求资金。【原文：Lenders in the euro zone are likely to turn to the European Central Bank for funding more frequently in the future as policymakers’ stash of bonds is reduced, according to Executive Board member Isabel Schnabel.】

item.title: 特朗普获胜后国债走势暂停，焦点转向美联储
item.description: 周四，随着投资者的注意力从唐纳德-特朗普赢得美国总统大选转向包括美联储在内的主要央行的利率决定，国债的震荡性抛售暂停。【原文：A seismic selloff in Treasuries paused Thursday as investors’ attention turned from Donald Trump’s victory in the US presidential election to interest-rate decisions from major central banks including the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 日产汽车下调业绩展望，宣布重组并裁员 9000 人
item.description: 日产汽车公司下调了年度利润展望，宣布计划裁员 9000 人，并将产能减少 20%，以应对主要市场销售恶化的局面。【原文：Nissan Motor Co. lowered its annual profit outlook, announced plans to cut 9,000 jobs and reduce capacity by 20%, as it seeks to cope with deteriorating sales in major markets.】

item.title: iShares比特币ETF交易量创纪录，加密货币历史性上涨再添动力
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）承诺将美国置于数字资产行业的中心，这一承诺正在重塑加密货币市场。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump’s pledge to put the US at the center of the digital-asset industry is reshaping the crypto market.】

item.title: 美国收益率飙升向特朗普发出信息：债券守夜人觉醒了
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普在美国总统大选中大获全胜，在华尔街掀起了一股买入信号的洪流。然而，有一个明显的例外。【原文：Donald Trump’s sweeping win in the US presidential election set off a torrent of buy-signals across Wall Street. There was, however, one notable exception.】

item.title: 英国电信因业务部门前景黯淡下调 2025 年收入预测
item.description: 英国电信集团（BT Group Plc）下调了公司 2025 财年的收入指导，原因是首席执行官艾利森-柯克比（Allison Kirkby）正在实施一项重大的扭亏计划，业务部门前景黯淡。【原文：BT Group Plc lowered the company’s 2025 fiscal year revenue guidance due to a weak outlook for its business department, as Chief Executive Officer Allison Kirkby implements a major turnaround plan.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利资本国际公司（MSCI）通过剔除更多股票降低中国在衡量指标中的比重
item.description: 摩根斯坦利资本国际公司（MSCI Inc. 在中国政府的刺激政策未能阻止中国股市在地区基准中的地位下降后，进一步削减了中国股票的比重，尽管该公司将更多的印度股票纳入其衡量标准。【原文：MSCI Inc. further trimmed Chinese stocks after Beijing’s stimulus blitz failed to halt the market’s diminishing presence in regional benchmarks, even as it added more Indian equities to its measures.】

item.title: 中国市场持续疲软，资生堂下调全年业绩预期
item.description: 日本化妆品巨头资生堂株式会社（Shiseido Co.【原文：Shiseido Co. slashed its profit outlook for the year as the Japanese cosmetics giant reported a plunge in net income amid a persistent slump in the key Chinese market.】

item.title: 汽车公司正与银行洽谈至少 5 亿美元贷款事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国最大的汽车租赁公司之一易车公司正在与银行商讨潜在的银团贷款事宜。【原文：Car Inc., one of China’s biggest car rental firms, is in discussion with banks for a potential syndicated loan, said people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 阿迪恩净营收不及预期，销量增长放缓
item.description: Adyen NV 的净收入低于分析师预期，原因是该支付公司第三季度的交易量增长放缓。【原文：Adyen NV’s net revenue fell short of analyst expectations, as the payment firm’s volume growth decelerated in the third quarter.】
